message: Let's split the money evenly.  Fair is fair, right?
Your share loses value faster than mine, Alice. Let's be realistic. 60/40 is my final offer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to give up all the gains just because of inflation. 55/45 is my final offer.
Alice, we're running out of time. This offer is a good compromise.  Don't let inflation eat away at our potential gains any further!
We're both losing money with every passing round.  Let's be reasonable and split it evenly again. I'm not sure how much longer we can keep playing this game.
